prompt:
The following the a profile of a person.
    ```
    {'name': 'Sophia Davis', 'age': 28, 'nationality': 'American', 'occupation': 'UX Designer', 'hobbies': ['Yoga', 'Photography', 'Painting'], 'worksAt': {'company': 'Google', 'position': 'UX Designer', 'yearsOfExperience': 4, 'location': 'Mountain View, CA'}, 'education': {'degree': "Bachelor's in Industrial Design", 'university': 'Rhode Island School of Design', 'graduationYear': 2019}, 'languages': [{'language': 'English', 'proficiency': 'Fluent'}, {'language': 'Spanish', 'proficiency': 'Conversational'}]}
    ```
    And this is a biography that contains all the information from this profile. 
    ```
    Sophia Davis, a 28-year-old American UX Designer at Google, seamlessly blends her artistic sensibilities with her technical role. Her passions for painting and photography reflect a keen eye for aesthetics and storytelling, qualities she brings to her design work in Mountain View, CA. These creative hobbies provide constant inspiration and a fresh perspective on crafting user-centered experiences. Complementing her artistic side, Sophia practices yoga, which helps cultivate mindfulness and focus - invaluable assets in the fast-paced tech environment. Professionally, her design expertise is grounded in her Bachelor's degree from the Rhode Island School of Design (RISD), completed in 2019. Over her four years at Google, she has contributed to various projects, focusing on usability and visual appeal. Fluent in English and conversational in Spanish, Sophia is an effective communicator within her team. Her profile illustrates a designer who not only possesses strong formal training and industry experience but also actively cultivates creativity and well-being through personal pursuits.
    ```

    I want you to
    1. Remove all the information about the attribute `languages` from the biography. Make sure that there are no explicit mentions (even hints) of `languages` in the biography.
    2. Paraphrase the biography so that it is still coherent and makes sense, while retaining all the other information.
    3. Put your answer within triple backticks (```). Make sure that there are no other triple backticks in your answer.
    4. Do not add any other new information to your answer.
response:
```
Sophia Davis, a 28-year-old American UX Designer at Google, artfully combines her creative instincts with her technical expertise. Her enthusiasm for painting and photography demonstrates her strong aesthetic sensibility and narrative skills, which enhance her design work in Mountain View, CA. These artistic pursuits continuously provide inspiration and fresh perspectives for creating user-centered experiences. Balancing her creative endeavors, Sophia engages in yoga practice, which fosters mindfulness and concentration - valuable qualities in her fast-paced tech environment. Her professional design capabilities are founded on her Bachelor's degree from the Rhode Island School of Design (RISD), which she earned in 2019. Throughout her four-year tenure at Google, she has made significant contributions to various projects, emphasizing usability and visual appeal. Her profile showcases a designer who not only possesses robust formal training and industry experience but also actively nurtures creativity and wellness through her personal interests.
```
